title: Lisa Rinna gets in an early workout wearing sweats and a shirt in new dancing videos for her fans
text:
Fans flock to her social media platform for a playful look into the life of a Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star.

And Lisa Rinna gave her two million followers an inside look into her morning routine as she danced on Instagram in slouchy sweats and a shirt.

What's usually reserved for one sporadic video at a time, Rinna broke her own posting rules to share two separate clips dancing to her favorite artists.

Moves for days: Lisa Rinna gave her two million followers an inside look into her morning routine as she danced on Instagram in slouchy sweats and a shirt

The 56-year-old reality star appeared to be jamming at home in a pair of grey Free City sweatpants.

Peeks of her toned torso peered out from underneath a loose black T-shirt as she bopped around the room.

Lisa went relatively makeup-free for the jazzy display and wore her signature brunette tresses tousled.

Dancing queen: What's usually reserved for one sporadic video at a time, Rinna broke her own posting rules to share two separate clips dancing to her favorite artists

Taking requests? The 56-year-old reality star appeared to be jamming at home in a pair of grey Free City sweatpants

One short clip showed the wife of Harry Hamlin singing the lyrics to Michael Jackson's Billy Jean.

In another video shared soon after, Lisa admitted she loved Harry Styles' new song Lights Up.

Finding the beat is certainly in her heart and soul more than a decade after first appearing on the hit ABC program Dancing With The Stars.

Footloose: Lisa went relatively makeup-free for the jazzy display and wore her signature brunette tresses tousled

In 2006, The Days of Our Lives alum was partnered up with Louis van Amstel and competed against a slew of celebrities in the dancing tournament, but came up short in the quest to win the coveted mirrorball trophy.

While Cheryl Burke and Drew Lachey were crowned the winners during the second season, Lisa was certainly a fan favorite.

She regularly boasts about her marriage to husband Harry Hamlin and has helped guide her daughters Amelia and Delilah to supermodel status, just like famed momager Kris Jenner.
description: What's usually reserved for one sporadic video at a time, Rinna broke her own posting rules to share two separate clips dancing to her favorite artists.
